dongGoi: Hộp 3 vỉ x 10 viên; Hộp 10 vỉ x 10 viên
taDuoc: Tinh bột ngô, Lactose monohydrate, Polyvinyl pyrrolidon (PVP) K30, Magnesi stearat, Natri starch glycolate, Colloidal sillicon dioxyd (Aerosil), Hydroxypropylmethyl  cellulose (HPMC) 606, Hydroxypropylmethyl cellulose (HPMC) 615, Titan dioxyd, Talc, Polyethylen glycol (PEG) 6000
